script
start !style_error(Unknown construction message:) Exception: scriptTable_1_0 devicemanagement Test not run


Narrative

As OSGP I want to receive event notifications of a device

NOTE

OSGP does not store event notification settings and does not know whether a device is allowed to send a particular notification. Therefore each supported event notification is stored when it is received from a registered device. The OSGP client is responsible for maintaining event notification settings.

Scenario: Successfully receive event notifications

scenario example device eventtype description index
given a registered device @device
and a OSLP event notification message with @eventtype and @description and @index
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is stored on OSGP
and the OSGP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

Scenario: Receive event notifications from an unregistered device

scenario example unregistered device eventtype description index
given a unregistered device @device
and a OSLP event notification message with @eventtype and @description and @index
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then the OSLP event notification message is not stored on OSGP
and the OSGP sends an OSLP event notification message with status REJECTED

example unregistered
device eventtype description index
UNKNOWN FIRMWARE_EVENTS_ACTIVATING Hacking!!!! EMPTY
scenario example unregistered device eventtype description index
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a unregistered device UNKNOWN
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a OSLP event notification message with FIRMWARE_EVENTS_ACTIVATING and Hacking!!!! and EMPTY
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the OSLP event notification message is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the OSLP event notification message is not stored on OSGP
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the OSGP sends an OSLP event notification message with status REJECTED

Scenario: Receive multiple event notifications in one request

scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given a registered device @device
and a OSLP event notification message with multiple @eventtypes and @indexes
when the OSLP event notification message is received
then @numberOfEvents OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSGP each with @indexes
and the OSGP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK

example multiple
device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON 0 1
scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a registered device device1
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a OSLP event notification message with multiple LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON and 0
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the OSLP event notification message is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist 1 OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSGP each with 0
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the OSGP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON 1 1
scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a registered device device1
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a OSLP event notification message with multiple LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON and 1
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the OSLP event notification message is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist 1 OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSGP each with 1
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the OSGP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON 1, 2 2
scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a registered device device1
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a OSLP event notification message with multiple LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON and 1, 2
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the OSLP event notification message is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist 2 OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSGP each with 1, 2
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the OSGP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_OFF 1, 2, 4 3
scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a registered device device1
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a OSLP event notification message with multiple LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_OFF and 1, 2, 4
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the OSLP event notification message is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist 3 OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSGP each with 1, 2, 4
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the OSGP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, HARDWARE_FAILURE_RELAY 1, 1 2
scenario example multiple device eventtypes indexes numberOfEvents
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a registered device device1
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a OSLP event notification message with multiple LIGHT_EVENTS_LIGHT_ON, HARDWARE_FAILURE_RELAY and 1, 1
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the OSLP event notification message is received
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist 2 OSLP event notification messages is stored on OSGP each with 1, 1
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the OSGP sends an OSLP event notification message with status OK
